ITEM.LONG_TXT: U1&DEFINITION& ASAllow to define when exporting a component what should exactly be exported. Four levels are possible: B10 - Only the component it self B13 - Component and sub component like in SAP Transport Request B16 - Component and sub component required for installation B19 - Component with all possible sub component * Depending on the connector and the component type content exported won't be the same. U1Dictionary Objects * DOMA : Domain => Level doesn't change anything * DTEL : Data Element => Level doesn't change anything * ENQU : Enqueue => Level doesn't change anything * INDX : Index => Level doesn't change anything * MCID : Match Code ID => Level doesn't change anything * MCOB : Match Code Object => Level doesn't change anything * SHLP : Search Help => Level doesn't change anything * SQLT : Cluster Pool => Level doesn't change anything * TABL : Table or Structure B1Level 0 - Table only without indexes B1Level 3 - Table and his indexes B1Level 6 - Table, his indexes and table content if table is customizing table B1Level 9 - Table, his indexes and table content * TABU : Table Content => Level doesn't change anything * TTYP : Table Type => Level doesn't change anything * TYPE : Type Group => Level doesn't change anything * VIEW : View => Level doesn't change anything * XINX : Extension Index => Level doesn't change anything

ITEM.SHORT_TXT: Component and sub component like in SAP Transport Request
Component and sub component required for installation
Component with all possible sub component
